p: As shown in Table 3, the increase of DbE concentration resulted in a significant decrease in TS and an increase in the ELB ( p < .05) (Aguirre, Borneo, & Leon, 2013; Sánchez‐González et al., 2009). F6 showed the highest TS and the lowest ELB and F9 showed the lowest TS and the highest ELB, which is in agreement with the findings of Aguirre et al. ( 2013). The addition of essential oils changed mechanical properties of developed films by the degradation of the film matrix due to changes in the molecular level (Chen & Lai, 2008), their oily nature (Sánchez‐González et al., 2009) or as a polymer emollient (Aguirre et al., 2013). The essential oils weaken the film's inner bonds and increase the flexibility and mobility of polymer chains (Aguirre et al., 2013).
